remarks: Any cofinal map implies the existence of a strictly monotone cofinal map with a domain no larger than the original.  Proposition 11.7 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 101.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Mar-2013.)
statement:
cofsmo.1 $e |- C = { y e. B | A. w e. y ( f ` w ) e. ( f ` y ) } $.
cofsmo.2 $e |- K = |^| { x e. B | z C_ ( f ` x ) } $.
cofsmo.3 $e |- O = OrdIso ( _E , C ) $.
cofsmo $p |- ( ( Ord A /\ B e. On ) -> ( E. f ( f : B --> A /\ A. z e. A E. w e. B z C_ ( f ` w ) ) -> E. x e. suc B E. g ( g : x --> A /\ Smo g /\ A. z e. A E. v e. x z C_ ( g ` v ) ) ) ) $.
$d A f g v w x z $.
$d B f v w x y z $.
$d C v $.
$d K v w y $.
$d O g v x z $.
